name: Mountains Rivers and Flats v0.5
description:
WASD to move the camera.

B to open building menu.

N to toggle display of names.

Once built you can click on them to look into more info about them.

Use the number pad to effect terrain generation (soz if u are using a laptop) Number pad 5 regenerates the land, and 1 - 9 (not including 5) change how the world will generate. You will see the info on the left :).

I have plans for this game.. but who knows if they will happen XD 

14/10/2021 - v0.5 - Added the basic infrastructureto more around armies (At the moment their is no cost XD)
